Preterit.turoyo: omərkle u=šamʕo b-iḏe. hbīṭ u=qašo, mayəṯ 126; prs 223/30; qāmazzinohul d-aṯyonodísaneməḷḷuxgd-oṯeno w-l=aṯəthīč l=qamayt-ayḏihbiṭono
translations: ‘I went (from home) until I came (to you). You have told me again and again: “I will come” – but you did not come toward me at all, and I was scared’
